content: slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through both the stitch and loop on hook space/s space/s the space between the stitches stitch/es st/s the stitch itself copyright melanie grobler m and m crochet designs pg 5 pumpkin make as many as you like using colour orange make a magic_ring helpful hint if you are working in velvet/plush yarn you can replace the magic_ring by chaining 3 slip stitch into 1st chain then continue round 1 helpful hint we are working in the round round 1 top of pumpkin chain 1 does not count as a st single_crochet 6 into mc place st marker in 6th single_crochet and continue to work in the round 6 single_crochet helpful hint move the stitch marker and place in the last stitch of each round this will help keep your stitch count correct and help with round counting because we are working quite tightly in the round i weave my beginning tail in whilst working round 2 round 2 *single_crochet 2 into next st* repeat * * 5 more times 12 single_crochet helpful hint with my patterns i usually always start with an increase in the 1st stitch so if your increase stitch falls in the 1st stitch of the increase stitch from the last round your stitch count should be correct round 3 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next st* repeat * * 5 more times 18 single_crochet round 4 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next 2 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 24 single_crochet round 5 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next 3 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 30 single_crochet round 6 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next 4 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 36 single_crochet round 7 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next 5 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 42 single_crochet round 8 *single_crochet 2 into next st single_crochet into next 6 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 48 single_crochet helpful hint if you want to make a bigger pumpkin you can continue increasing until you have the size you want just remember that you will then need to decrease until you 12 stitches copyright melanie grobler m and m crochet designs pg 6 rounds 9 11 helpful hint you can add more rounds if you would like a thicker pumpkin single_crochet into next 48 sts 48 single_crochet round 12 *inv decrease single_crochet into next 6 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 42 single_crochet round 13 *inv decrease single_crochet into next 5 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 36 single_crochet round 14 *inv decrease single_crochet into next 4 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 30 single_crochet round 15 *inv decrease single_crochet into next 3 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 24 single_crochet round 16 *inv decrease single_crochet into next 2 sts* repeat * * 5 more times 18 single_crochet helpful hint you can firmly stuff the pumpkin be
